title.narrative: 43 COMMUNICATION/ ADVOCACY

description.narrative: 'The Media, CSOs and Goodwill Ambassadors have relevant information and are advocating for the realization of children rights, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Child-focused evidence generated and used to influence Federal, State and select LGA policies, programmes, plans and budgets towards addressing child equity and social inclusion by 2017.

title.narrative: Media dialogues held with media executives, CSOs and policy makers
Human interest stories published, media appearances by SMs in the media, Face Book posts

Media has enhanced capacity and advocate on behalf of children
Four schools of journalism are working with curriculum on child right reporting
